article_title: Anti-Obamacare Expansion Governors Clean Up On Election Day

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: By Jonathan Ingram and Josh Archambault — Mr. Ingram is research director at the Foundation for Government Accountability. Mr. Archambault is a senior fellow there. For months, Obamacare advocates and a sizeable swath of the mainstream media warned Republicans that opposing Obamacare's Medicaid expansion would cost them dearly in their re-elections. Last Tuesday’s results [...]
